name: Untitled Shooting Game (Ducking Donuts)
description:
Untitled Shooting Game is a 2 players arcade shooter were  you control a ball that slides all over the place and  can shoot a smaller ball to the other player.

It's  my first "original game" that isn't a copy of an already existing one.

It's only a demo with 1 stage and if people enjoy it i will  work on adding more stages and an arcade mode that will worp you to another stage every time a player wins, but first i need feedback and suggestions.

If you decide to download the game, thank you.

-Ducking Donuts

Controls

P1     Move W/A/S/D     Shoot C

P2     Move I/J/K/L     Shoot N

!!ONLY TWO PLAYERS, NO BOT!!
